primary_modifications: Added responsive flexDirection to button container using breakpoints (xs: column, sm: row)
Added responsive gridTemplateColumns to form field layout using breakpoints (xs: 1fr, sm: 1fr 1fr)
file_insights.pattern: MUI responsive design pattern with breakpoint-based layout shifts

primary_modifications: Added responsive gridTemplateColumns to 4 separate grid containers
All changes follow identical pattern: { xs: '1fr', sm: '1fr 1fr' }
file_insights.pattern: Consistent mobile-first responsive grid implementation across multiple form sections

patterns_discovered.description: Systematic application of MUI breakpoint syntax to convert fixed layouts to responsive designs
patterns_discovered.implementation: sx prop with breakpoint objects (xs for mobile single column, sm for larger screens with multi-column)

patterns_discovered.description: Two-column grid layouts on larger screens collapse to single column on mobile
All responsive changes use identical breakpoint values and gap spacing
patterns_discovered.details: xs=single column, sm=dual column, gap=2 (8px) maintained throughout

gotchas_discovered.description: All responsive changes use sm as the breakpoint for dual-column. Should verify this aligns with application-wide responsive design standards
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Check if other pages use same sm breakpoint threshold

gotchas_discovered.description: Single column layout on mobile (xs breakpoint) may not address input sizing or touch target optimization
gotchas_discovered.details: Only layout changes applied; no adjustments to input field sizing, padding, or touch-friendly spacing

gotchas_discovered.description: Gap value (2) remains fixed across all breakpoints; may be too large or small on mobile

approach_outcome.notes: Straightforward responsive design updates using MUI sx prop breakpoints. All changes follow consistent pattern and are syntactically correct.

recommendations.suggestion: Audit all form pages to ensure uniform use of sm breakpoint for multi-column to single-column transitions
Consider adding responsive gap values (e.g., { xs: 1, sm: 2 }) to improve mobile spacing consistency
Review mobile input field sizing and padding to ensure comfortable touch targets on small screens
Verify responsive layouts at exact breakpoint thresholds (< 600px for xs, >= 600px for sm)
